info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 3:40PM EDT until April 06 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... West central Union County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... North central Chester County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern York County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 340 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Rock Hill, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Southwest Charlotte, Fort Mill, Pineville, Tega Cay, Newport, Lesslie, Marvin, Carowinds and Mcconnells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
